Articles.Content:
This is a defining moment... usually by now KSP bombs on me - I've lost count of the restarts/installs.

Anyway all looks stable and 'Good to Go'.

Just 2 excavation/miners to bring up, plus a few boxes to create a mining site with.

I'm going to try make staging/refueling bases on Mun and Minmus.

![qBPYt0s.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/qBPYt0s.jpg)

The game is cracking up when controlling the mothership - FrameRate drops to 6'ish ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif) - but when controlling the smaller parts all is OK 

Funny enough the frame rate only dropped halfway to Mun... I think this problem has something to do with Unity and the Persistence files as Unity has these specific Null Reference messages.

I'm angling on object 're-'creation memory leaks for this bug story, as the problems are not consistent.

...anyway back on track...

Arrival at Mun..

![nD1l127.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nD1l127.jpg)

Probes sent on their way..

![aKebeKM.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/aKebeKM.jpg)

..and of course, team work by the 'mining team'

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/xl1yre1na6t6yju/KarbMiners.mp4?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xl1yre1na6t6yju/KarbMiners.mp4?dl=0)
